tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very happy with the treatments done by Dr Nikita Motwani  and Dr Nitesh Motwani  - they do all treatment perfectly- very gently- asking at all the time about feeling any pain ....God Bless both of them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Teeth Whitening, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Teeth Bleaching Treatment,
review:
Rating:- 6.5/10
Went for teeth cleaning, whitening, polishing and buffing.
Dr. Nikita is one of the best dentists i've ever visited.

She explained the entire procedure and calmed me down.
Overall vibe of the place is also good. Read a lot of reviews before going and the doctors did not disappoint when it comes to making you feel comfortable and in a safe space.
5/5 for services rendered by Dr. Nikita

However, I am not very satisfied with the end result.
Writing this review around 12 days after the procedure has been done.
Cleaning part was good. But whitening and bleaching hasn't been effective.
On a shade card, i may have gone 2-3 shades lighter. That's it. Not even close to white.

Even have some rough feeling on 2 of my teeth - including 1 pre-molar. 

Expected a better end result from the process. Not satisfied. I don't even know the next steps now.
1.5/5 for the result.

Would appreciate if someone can call me up from the clinic and advice on what can be done to make the situation better.

Even though Dr. Nikita was a gem of a doctor, I am not happy with the result!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cavities,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Swollen Gums,Cavities,Sensitive Teeth,
review: I visited Smile Concepts for my dental cleaning and cavity filling. The remarkable patience with which Dr. Nikita listened to my doubts, fears and anxieties regarding visiting a dentist and other teeth related issues,  is something I have not seen with doctors here in Mumbai. There was no rush to just dismiss off the patient and immediately be done with the treatment.I kept on asking  questions and she calmly listened and answered and made me stay relaxed throughout the procedure.  So a big thumbs up on that!Im very satisfied with the treatment and would surely visit them again in future.With their extremely hygienic clinic, state of the art equipments and machines, they are quite affordable :)I would highly recommend this clinic to everyone for various dental treatments.Thanks a lot  Smile Concepts!üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Nikita is very friendly and patient while giving the treatment. I was in so much pain before coming to her but she did a completely painless RCT. She kept on explaining me the steps which was really ensuring. I will definitely recommend her and will visit her for all my future dental problems.

I am happy with today's visit to Dr Nikita. This was my first visit with her and definitely not the last. Very reasonable in terms of charges. Plus the facility is well maintained and spacious. I was suprised to not see a lot of patients around considering it was the weekend. 
Dr Nikita is warm and will keep talking with the patient through the whole process keeping them informed on what's happening.

Dr. Motwani took time and effort to explain in detail my dental condition and come up with a step by step plan to deal with it. She is chatty and friendly and keeps the operation table a stressfree environment. Would definitely recommend her as a dentist.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very happy with the care and patience 
Dr.nikita is very meticulous and gives detailed explanation about the problem and solution.
Would highly recommend...5 stars

review:
Hats off to Dr. Nikita madam. She is having lot of patience . She is very professional in her work .and very sincere.. I was having very deep infection and unbearable pain. My pain has vanished..
 In the present circumstances of COVID 19 she and her staff  took utmost care like sanitization / disinfection and provided hand gloves shower cap and foot cover  In short I will give her 10 out of 10. Marks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Nikita is friendly, caring and a gentle Dentist. 

I am always nervous when going for a dental visit, as I have sensitive teeth and cannot deal with pain and drilling. So, when I went for my appointment with Dr. Nikita Motwani, first she listened to me about my worries. Dr. Nikita made certain I was very comfortable, she gently and painlessly numbed me completely before starting the work. During the procedure, Dr. Nikita kept asking me if I was comfortable and also explained exactly what was being done to fix the problems. Upon completing the dental work, I was given clear information on what to expect. I was surprised, post dental work, I didn't get the pain from the drilling as always felt in the past. 

I am truly grateful to you for taking care of my teeth. Thank you Dr. Nikita!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The ambience at the clinic is impressive and I felt safe with the Covid precautions taken. Dr and Mrs Motwani are friendly and patiently listened me and explained the procedure with clarity. 
I am highly impressed by the videos and instructions sent to me on WhatsApp prior to my appointment. This helped me in a big way to be perfectly at ease. It was quite a challenge for me to change my Dentist of almost a decade because of the risk involved in travelling the distance. But having experienced their treatment, I'm perfectly satisfied and will undoubtedly share my beautiful experiences with all my dear and near ones.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After visiting many dentist I went to Dr.Nikita Motwani nobody was able to solve my pain problem but Dr.Nikita with her skills solved my pain and relieved me from sleepless nights she did my RCT with ease and post that she delivered me beautiful smile as my front tooth need some cosmetic job to be done ...
In this covid they are following all protocol and was impressed by there Special Sterilization Zone where they took care of Sterilization and ensure you are safe and in hygienic clinic
And all team at smile concepts is always welcoming ...will recommend my friend and family for Dental treatment
